items.title: 3 underappreciated smaller stocks that can surge in the final leg of 2025, per Morgan Stanley traders
items.description: Smaller stocks that could win big in the latter half of the year include Wayfair and Cinemark.

items.title: These 'cash rich' stocks can ride out any market downturn, says Morgan Stanley
items.description: Morgan Stanley analysts these cash-rich companies' stocks are poised to perform well, even as the possibility of a broader market downturn looms.

items.title: This private equity giant has formed a chart pattern that signals more gains ahead
items.description: Chart analyst David Keller breaks down a bullish chart formation on this PE stock.

items.title: Warner Bros. Discovery is an ‘attractive’ takeover candidate that could have a surprising buyer, says Wells Fargo
items.description: Wells Fargo views Netflix as the "most compelling buyer" of Warner Bros. Discovery's streaming and studios segment.

items.title: Look for unloved stocks in areas such as health care and banking before Fed cuts rates
items.description: Investor Tim Seymour is looking for pockets of unloved stocks to scoop up before the Fed decision.
